data:
## function_createSlider
> **createSlider**(`props`?): [`SliderWidget`](#sliderwidget)

Create a Slider with given config props

### Parameters

• **props?**: [`PropsConfig`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/slider/../../types#propsconfig)\<[`SliderProps`](#sliderprops)\>

### Returns

[`SliderWidget`](#sliderwidget)

a SliderWidget

## function_getSliderDefaultConfig
> **getSliderDefaultConfig**(): [`SliderProps`](#sliderprops)

Retrieve a shallow copy of the default Slider config

### Returns

[`SliderProps`](#sliderprops)

the default Slider config

## interface_HandleDisplayOptions
### Properties

#### left

> **left**: `null` \| `number`

Left offset of the handle in %

***

#### top

> **top**: `null` \| `number`

Top offset of the handle in %

## interface_ProgressDisplayOptions
### Properties

#### bottom

> **bottom**: `null` \| `number`

Bottom offset of the progress in %

***

#### height

> **height**: `number`

Height of hte progress in %

***

#### left

> **left**: `null` \| `number`

Right offset of the progress in %

***

#### right

> **right**: `null` \| `number`

Left offset of the progress in %

***

#### top

> **top**: `null` \| `number`

Top offset of the progress in %

***

#### width

> **width**: `number`

Width of the progress in %

## class_SliderComponent
### Constructors

#### new SliderComponent

> **new SliderComponent**(): [`SliderComponent`](#slidercomponent)

##### Returns

[`SliderComponent`](#slidercomponent)

### Properties

#### ariaLabelHandle

> **ariaLabelHandle**: `undefined` \| (`value`, `sortedIndex`, `index`) => `string`

Return the value for the 'aria-label' attribute for the handle

##### Param

value of the handle

##### Param

index of the handle in the sorted list

##### Param

index of the handle in the original list

##### Default Value

```ts
(value: number) => '' + value
```

***

#### ariaValueText

> **ariaValueText**: `undefined` \| (`value`, `sortedIndex`, `index`) => `string`

Return the value for the 'aria-valuetext' attribute for the handle

##### Param

value of the handle

##### Param

index of the handle in the sorted list

##### Param

index of the handle in the original list

##### Default Value

```ts
(value: number) => '' + value
```

***

#### className

> **className**: `undefined` \| `string`

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### disabled

> **disabled**: `undefined` \| `boolean`

If `true` slider value cannot be changed and the slider cannot be focused

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### handle

> **handle**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/slider/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`SliderSlotHandleContext`](#sliderslothandlecontext)\>

Slot to change the handlers

***

#### label

> **label**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/slider/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`SliderSlotLabelContext`](#sliderslotlabelcontext)\>

Slot to change the default labels of the slider

##### Default Value

```ts
({value}: SliderSlotLabelContext) => '' + value
```

***

#### max

> **max**: `undefined` \| `number`

Maximum value that can be assigned to the slider

##### Default Value

`100`

***

#### min

> **min**: `undefined` \| `number`

Minimum value that can be assigned to the slider

##### Default Value

`0`

***

#### readonly

> **readonly**: `undefined` \| `boolean`

If `true` slider value cannot be changed but the slider is still focusable

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### rtl

> **rtl**: `undefined` \| `boolean`

It `true` slider display is inversed

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### showMinMaxLabels

> **showMinMaxLabels**: `undefined` \| `boolean`

If `true` the min and max labels are displayed on the slider

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### showValueLabels

> **showValueLabels**: `undefined` \| `boolean`

If `true` the value labels are displayed on the slider

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### slotHandleFromContent

> **slotHandleFromContent**: `undefined` \| [`SliderHandleDirective`](#sliderhandledirective)

***

#### slotLabelFromContent

> **slotLabelFromContent**: `undefined` \| [`SliderLabelDirective`](#sliderlabeldirective)

***

#### slotStructureFromContent

> **slotStructureFromContent**: `undefined` \| [`SliderStructureDirective`](#sliderstructuredirective)

***

#### stepSize

> **stepSize**: `undefined` \| `number`

Unit value between slider steps

##### Default Value

`1`

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/slider/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`SliderContext`](#slidercontext)\>

Slot to change the default display of the slider

***

#### values

> **values**: `undefined` \| `number`[]

Current slider values

##### Default Value

`[0]`

***

#### valuesChange

> **valuesChange**: `EventEmitter`\<`number`[]\>

An event emitted when slider values are changed

Event payload equals to the updated slider values

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### vertical

> **vertical**: `undefined` \| `boolean`

If `true` is vertically positioned otherwise it is horizontal

##### Default Value

`false`

Retrieves the widget api

Retrieves the widget state as an Angular Signal

##### Returns

[`AngularState`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/slider/../../types#angularstate)\<`W`\>

the widget state

## interface_SliderDirectives
### Properties

#### clickableAreaDirective

> **clickableAreaDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/slider/../../types#directive)

Directive to apply to the slider clickable area, to directly move the handle to a given specific position

***

#### combinedHandleLabelDisplayDirective

> **combinedHandleLabelDisplayDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/slider/../../types#directive)

Directive to apply to the handle when combined label display is active

***

#### handleDirective

> **handleDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/slider/../../types#directive)\<`object`\>

Directive to apply to the slider handle if any

##### Type declaration

###### item

> **item**: [`SliderHandle`](#sliderhandle)

***

#### handleEventsDirective

> **handleEventsDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/slider/../../types#directive)\<`object`\>

Directive to apply handle events handlers

##### Type declaration

###### item

> **item**: `object`

###### item.id

> **id**: `number`

***

#### handleLabelDisplayDirective

> **handleLabelDisplayDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/slider/../../types#directive)\<`object`\>

Directive to apply to the handle when combined label display is not active

##### Type declaration

###### index

> **index**: `number`

***

#### maxLabelDirective

> **maxLabelDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/slider/../../types#directive)

Directive to get the maxLabel elementRef

***

#### minLabelDirective

> **minLabelDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/slider/../../types#directive)

Directive to get the minLabel elementRef

***

#### progressDisplayDirective

> **progressDisplayDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/slider/../../types#directive)\<`object`\>

Directive used to style the progress display for each handle

##### Type declaration

###### option

> **option**: [`ProgressDisplayOptions`](#progressdisplayoptions)

***

#### sliderDirective

> **sliderDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/slider/../../types#directive)

Directive to get the slider component elementRef

## interface_SliderState
### Properties

#### className

> **className**: `string`

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### combinedLabelDisplay

> **combinedLabelDisplay**: `boolean`

If true, the label when the handles are close is visible

***

#### combinedLabelPositionLeft

> **combinedLabelPositionLeft**: `number`

Combined label left offset in %

***

#### combinedLabelPositionTop

> **combinedLabelPositionTop**: `number`

Combined label top offset in %

***

#### disabled

> **disabled**: `boolean`

If `true` slider value cannot be changed and the slider cannot be focused

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### handle

> **handle**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/slider/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`SliderSlotHandleContext`](#sliderslothandlecontext)\>

Slot to change the handlers

***

#### handleDisplayOptions

> **handleDisplayOptions**: [`HandleDisplayOptions`](#handledisplayoptions)[]

Array of objects representing handle display options

***

#### interactive

> **interactive**: `boolean`

Check if the slider is interactive, meaning it is not disabled or readonly

***

#### label

> **label**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/slider/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`SliderSlotLabelContext`](#sliderslotlabelcontext)\>

Slot to change the default labels of the slider

##### Default Value

```ts
({value}: SliderSlotLabelContext) => '' + value
```

***

#### max

> **max**: `number`

Maximum value that can be assigned to the slider

##### Default Value

`100`

***

#### maxValueLabelDisplay

> **maxValueLabelDisplay**: `boolean`

If true, the maximum label will be visible

***

#### min

> **min**: `number`

Minimum value that can be assigned to the slider

##### Default Value

`0`

***

#### minValueLabelDisplay

> **minValueLabelDisplay**: `boolean`

If true, the minimum label will be visible

***

#### progressDisplayOptions

> **progressDisplayOptions**: [`ProgressDisplayOptions`](#progressdisplayoptions)[]

Array of objects representing progress display options

***

#### readonly

> **readonly**: `boolean`

If `true` slider value cannot be changed but the slider is still focusable

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### rtl

> **rtl**: `boolean`

It `true` slider display is inversed

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### showMinMaxLabels

> **showMinMaxLabels**: `boolean`

If `true` the min and max labels are displayed on the slider

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### showValueLabels

> **showValueLabels**: `boolean`

If `true` the value labels are displayed on the slider

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### sortedHandles

> **sortedHandles**: [`SliderHandle`](#sliderhandle)[]

Array of the sorted handles to display

***

#### sortedValues

> **sortedValues**: `number`[]

Sorted slider values

***

#### stepSize

> **stepSize**: `number`

Unit value between slider steps

##### Default Value

`1`

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/slider/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`SliderContext`](#slidercontext)\>

Slot to change the default display of the slider

***

#### values

> **values**: `number`[]

Current slider values

##### Default Value

`[0]`

***

#### vertical

> **vertical**: `boolean`

If `true` is vertically positioned otherwise it is horizontal

##### Default Value

`false`
